Description: Grey granite seated statue of Amun(?) with the smaller standing figure of Nakhthorheb between the legs; cartouches of the king on his apron; heads and feet of both figures are lost.
Curator's comments: See PM viii, p. 152 Published: Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX (1988): 73, 83
To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).
Condition: incomplete - both heads and sets of feet lost
